SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM BOARD b JOIN USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE b.BOARD_STATE != '2' AND b.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}
AND b.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo, BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent, BOARD_TYPE AS boardType, BOARD_RDATE AS boardRdate, DATE_FORMAT(BOARD_RDATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS formattedBoardRdate, u.USER_ID AS userId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ECOMMENT e WHERE e.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO AND e.ECOMMENT_STATE = 1) AS eCommentCount, bk.BOOK_NO AS bookNo, p.IMAGE AS bookImgUrl, p.TITLE AS bookTitle, p.AUTHOR AS bookAuthor FROM BOARD b JOIN USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN BOOK bk ON b.BOOK_NO = bk.BOOK_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_API p ON bk.isbn = p.isbn WHERE b.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
